modShortDescription: Clean HUD for A20. Food, Water and XP removed from Toolbelt. Health, Stamina, Food, Water. Player Level with XP progress bar.
modDescription:
Clean [HUD](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-hud-mod/) for A20.

* Food, Water and XP removed from Toolbelt
* Health, Stamina, Food, Water
* Player Level with XP progress bar.

Works Server Side or Single Player as no Additional files are Required.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DyTWyzyAqRtrmI31Cxne8yQGNFKNPRTI/view?usp=sharing)**

**Credits:** Sparrow8332
